about_the_game:
Do you believe in Gods' existence ?

This is the story of a young girl led by an unexpected fate.

"The Garden of the Gods", a love simulation game (otome)

The curtain is opening now on a life with the Gods in an alternate world of Japanese style and gorgeous Live2D illustrations!




In the village of Hitotose, where the heroin lives, there is a cultural tradition in which every year one of the young girls who turned twenty years old is chosen to dedicate herself to the four seasons Gods of the Earth.
They called this young girl "The Chosen Maiden".
Several years before, the heroin's big sister left the village because she was Chosen.
What is she doing now?
What are exactly the Gods of the Earth?
Why there is no Chosen Maiden who comes back to the village...?
I have attended this year's ceremony with skepticism and a paper doll fell in front of me...?!
Will that be a happy end or everything will end in tears...?
Your fate changes depending on your choices! Capture the hearts of these handsome Gods and get the happy endings!




The Spring God Arata The Youngest x Helpful
The loyal and cheerful type who likes humans a lot
His kindness will certainly make you melt!
The Summer God Ren Pretentious x Clumsy
The tsundere type who dislikes a lot humans
His sometimes sentimental side will keep you enthusiastic about him!
The Autumn God Kaede Mean x Unfortunate
A mean and elusive boy
You will spend days attacked by his sadistic words!
The Winter God Shu Cold x Natural
A cold and taciturn boy
You're fascinated by the gap between some sides of his personality and his appearance!




1. Open the game, read the prologue
2. Choose the character you like the most
3. How your love story will be transformed by your own choices...?
4. If you rise up his affection level, you can unlock love scenarios which will make you melt !
5. There is two endings for each route! The ending is decided according to your choices!




Like otome and love simulation games
For those who want to play a free love simulation game and who like manga, novels, dramas and films about love
For those who are not satisfied with IRL relationships
For those who like surnatural worlds and handsome guys
For those who like a little bit of drama in stories
For those who want to enjoy foreseeable scenarios

name: The Garden of the Gods

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy The Garden of the Gods

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G3900 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compliant

short_description: ―Do you believe in Gods' existence ?――This is the story of a young girl led by an unexpected fate― ""The Garden of the Gods"", a love simulation game (otome). The curtain is opening now on a life with the Gods in an alternate world of Japanese style and gorgeous Live2D illustrations!
supported_languages:
English, French, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
